charges.charge_description: THEFT OF MAIL MATTER; 18 USC §§ 1708 AND 2(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of time served on each count, to be served concurrently; Special Assessment of $300.00; Fine waived; Restitution (joint and several) of $2,377.57; Supervised Release for a term of 3 years on all Counts, all such terms to run concurrently.

charges.charge_description: THEFT OF MAIL MATTER; 18 USC §§ 1708 AND 2(4-5)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of time served on each count, to be served concurrently; Special Assessment of $300.00; Fine waived; Restitution (joint and several) of $2,377.57; Supervised Release for a term of 3 years on all Counts, all such terms to run concurrently.

charges.charge_description: THEFT OF MAIL MATTER; 18 USC §§ 1708 AND 2(2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed by Order on motion by the government.

charges.charge_description: THEFT OF MAIL MATTER; 18 USC §§ 1708 AND 2(4)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 3 months, concurrent to sentence in 14-CR-214; Supervised Release for 3 years, concurrent to supervised release in 14-CR-214; Special Assessment of $100; Restitution in the amount of $2498.83.
